name: friendsoftypo3/frontend-editing
description: Enable editors to work with the content in the most intuitive way possible

scripts.ci:php:lint: find *.php Classes/ Configuration/ Tests/ -name '*.php' -print0 | xargs -0 -n 1 -P 4 php -l
scripts.ci:tests:unit: find 'Tests/Unit' -wholename '*Test.php' | parallel --gnu 'echo; echo "Running unit test suite {}"; .Build/bin/phpunit --verbose --bootstrap .Build/vendor/nimut/testing-framework/res/Configuration/UnitTestsBootstrap.php {}'
scripts.ci:tests:functional: find 'Tests/Functional' -wholename '*Test.php' | parallel --gnu 'echo; echo "Running functional test suite {}"; .Build/bin/phpunit --verbose --bootstrap .Build/vendor/nimut/testing-framework/res/Configuration/FunctionalTestsBootstrap.php {}'
docs:generate: docker run --rm t3docs/render-documentation show-shell-commands > tempfile.sh; echo 'dockrun_t3rd makehtml' >> tempfile.sh; bash tempfile.sh; rm tempfile.sh
